## DropModule.createDelayedRevealBatch() method

Create batch allows you to create a batch of tokens in one transaction. This function can only be called once per module at the moment.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createDelayedRevealBatch(placeholder: MetadataURIOrObject, metadatas: MetadataURIOrObject[], password: string): Promise<string[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  placeholder | [MetadataURIOrObject](./sdk.metadatauriorobject.md) |  |
|  metadatas | [MetadataURIOrObject](./sdk.metadatauriorobject.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The metadata to include in the batch. |
|  password | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string\[\]&gt;
